title: Fragments, 1995-50-149-a/c, ca. 1785
dimensions:
A. Warp: 92cm (36 1/4in.) Weft (both selvedges present): 92.5cm (36 3/4in.).
B. Warp: 145.5cm (57 1/4in.). Weft: (right selvedge only): 56cm (22in.).
C. Warp: 58.5cm (23in.). Weft (all edges cut): 35.5cm 
(13 3/4in.)
description: A sleeping Endymion woken by the goddess Diana  is combined with the deer from Diana's hunt  and an assortment of bucolic scenes including a bird stealing a sheep. In red on white.
